channel.title: India on BalleWale Cricket News
channel.description: Recent content in India on BalleWale Cricket News

item.title: India-Pakistan: Hope Builds That February 15 Fixture Will Go Ahead
item.description: As preparations for the February 15 fixture between India and Pakistan intensify, officials express optimism for a successful match.

item.title: BCB President, PCB, ICC in Lahore for Talks Over India Match Boycott
item.description: BCB President, PCB officials, and ICC representatives meet in Lahore to discuss the ongoing India match boycott ahead of the World Cup.

item.title: BCB President, PCB, ICC Hold Crucial Talks in Lahore Over India Match Boycott
item.description: BCB President, PCB, and ICC convene in Lahore to discuss the potential boycott of India matches amid ongoing tensions.

item.title: BCB President, PCB, ICC Meet in Lahore to Discuss India Match Boycott
item.description: BCB, PCB, and ICC officials convene in Lahore to address the ongoing India match boycott issue ahead of the upcoming World Cup.

item.title: Washington Sundar to Join Indian Squad Ahead of Namibia Clash
item.description: Washington Sundar is set to join the Indian cricket team in Delhi ahead of their upcoming match against Namibia.

item.title: Washington Sundar to Join Indian Squad in Delhi Ahead of Namibia Clash
item.description: Washington Sundar is set to reunite with the Indian team in Delhi before their upcoming match against Namibia.

item.title: ICC Seeks Clarification from PCB on Force Majeure for India Game Boycott
item.description: The ICC has requested the PCB to explain its invocation of Force Majeure regarding the boycott of the India match.

item.title: ICC Seeks Clarification from PCB on Force Majeure Invocation for India Game
item.description: The ICC has requested the PCB to explain its decision to invoke Force Majeure regarding the scheduled match against India.

item.title: ICC Seeks Clarification from PCB on Force Majeure Invocation for India Match
item.description: The ICC has requested the PCB to explain its decision to invoke Force Majeure regarding the upcoming match against India.

item.title: USA Bowl, India Opt for Siraj as Bumrah Misses Out Due to Illness
item.description: India's bowling lineup sees a change as Jasprit Bumrah is sidelined with illness, paving the way for Mohammed Siraj in the latest match against the USA.
